title: Maruti Suzuki launches ‘Finance from Anywhere’ campaign. Here are the details - HT Auto
content: Maruti Suzuki launches ‘Finance from Anywhere’ campaign. Here are the details  HT Auto
description: Maruti Suzuki says it has disbursed over ₹15,000 crores worth of loans to over 2.6 lakh customers since its Smart Finance platform was first launched in 2020.
